      • UDRestClient

        public UDRestClient(java.net.URI url,
                    java.lang.String clientUser,
                    java.lang.String clientPassword,
                    boolean trustAllCerts)
        Parameters:
        url - The url of the UrbanCode Deploy server.
        clientUser - The username of the UrbanCode Deploy user.
        clientPassword - The password of the UrbanCode Deploy user.
        trustAllCerts - Boolean to trust or deny all insecure certifications with the http client.

      • UDRestClient

        public UDRestClient(java.net.URI url,
                    org.apache.http.impl.client.DefaultHttpClient client)
        Create a client with a supplied HTTP client. The client must be configured with any proxy settings, credentials, etc required for correct operation. Subclasses will not be able to access the username or password if the instance is constructed with this method.
        Parameters:
        url - The url of the UrbanCode Deploy server.
        client - The HTTP client builder to make a REST call against the UrbanCode Deploy server.

        Parameters:

      • retryInvokeMethod

        protected org.apache.http.HttpResponse retryInvokeMethod(org.apache.http.client.methods.HttpRequestBase request,
                                                         java.lang.String logMethodName)
                                                  throws java.io.IOException
        Invokes the specified REST API method, with retry if the HTTP request returned a status code of 409 (Conflict). Uses default values for wait range and retry limit.
        Parameters:
        request - HTTP REST API method (for URI)
        logMethodName - [Optional, but recommended] if not null, logs message for each retry. and if the limit is reached. A value of null suppresses log messages.
        Returns:
        response from sending HTTP request
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException

      • retryInvokeMethod

        protected org.apache.http.HttpResponse retryInvokeMethod(org.apache.http.client.methods.HttpRequestBase request,
                                                         java.lang.String logMethodName,
                                                         int waitRangeMin,
                                                         int waitRangeMax,
                                                         int retryLimit)
                                                  throws java.io.IOException
        Invokes the specified REST API method, with retry if the HTTP request returned a status code of 409 (Conflict).
        Parameters:
        request - HTTP REST API method (for URI)
        logMethodName - [Optional, but recommended] if not null, logs message for each retry. and if the limit is reached. A value of null suppresses log messages.
        waitRangeMin - minimum number of milliseconds to wait if the invoke needs to retry.
        waitRangeMax - maximum number of milliseconds to wait if the invoke needs to retry.
        retryLimit - maximum times to retry if invoke fails, does not retry if value is less than 1.
        Returns:
        response from sending HTTP request
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException
